text:
Four habitual offenders were detained under the Goondas Act as per recommendations of Superintendent of Police A. Saravanan here on Monday. Collector T.N. Hariharan issued the order.

The detainees were S. Koteeswaran (23), B. Vinodh (24), K. Nagarajan (23) of Mattaparai and T. Niranjan (26) of Pallapatti in Nilakottai block.

They were arrested on the charge murdering petrol bunk staff and robbing cash from the bunk on November 7. They were lodged in Madurai prison.
title: Four detained under Goondas Act
